docs.text: hedwig and the angry inch ( 2001 ) john cameron mitchell , miriam shor , stephen trask , michael pitt , theodore liscinski , michael aronov , andrea martin , maurice dean wint , ben mayer-goodman .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: animation by emily hubley .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: adapted from the stage play by john cameron mitchell and stephen trask .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: music and lyrics by stephn trask .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: written and directed by john cameron mitchell .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: 91 minutes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: rated r , stars )
docs.label: positive

docs.text: had " hedwig and the angry inch " came out in the '70s , right after david bowie's " ziggy stardust , " it likely would now be regarded as one of the most popular rock musicals of all time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: released in the 500 channel , sensory overload world of 2001 , however , the big screen adaptation of the acclaimed off-broadway musical must do battle with countless other productions clamoring for attention .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i almost missed it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: every august , the major studios try to squeeze the last few dollars out of summer moviegoers by dumping all of their shakier offerings on the marketplace at once .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i was so busy trying to keep up with national releases like " summer catch " and " bubble boy " that i passed over any independent film that looked like it would only have a short local run .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but an e-mail from a reader asking why i hadn't reviewed the movie prompted me to make a late evening trip to the theater .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: thank goodness for readers like him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " hedwig and the angry inch " is a gender-bending glam-rock spectacular packed with great songs .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: stylistically , the hook-laden tunes are reminiscent of bowie , " bat out of hell " era meatloaf and " the rocky horror show , " without ever seeming like imitations .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as with " tommy , " " hedwig " tells a story of isolation , pain and defiance , but without the bloated feel of that beloved , but overrated rock opera .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: writer-director-star john cameron mitchell and composer-lyricist stephen trask have cooked up a real winner .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mitchell stars as hedwig , a singer from east berlin touring a chain of u . s . coffee shops with her pan-slavic band , the angry inch .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while the patrons of the run-down restaurants look on in shock , and sometimes horror , hedwig boldly tells the sad story of her life in song .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she was once a boy named hansel ( ben mayer-goodman ) , living with his mother ( alberta watson ) and listening to rock and roll on american armed forces radio .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: life is an exercise in duality for hansel .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a wall splits his hometown into two parts .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mother describes love as the emotion that comes when you find your other half .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as hansel grows up , the duality becomes more pronounced .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after initially mistaking him for a girl , a gi from the states ( maurice dean wint ) falls in love with hansel and wants to marry him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: alas , hansel will never pass the mandatory physical .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mother helpfully suggests a sex change , but the operation goes bad , hence the references to " the angry inch " ( yes , i know this part is squirm-inducing , but stick with me - it's worth it ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: several years later , mr . right is long gone and hansel becomes hedwig , decked out in a farrah fawcett-style wig and fronting a band made up of korean women .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: hedwig finds a new love in tommy ( michael pitt ) , a beatific lad with a unique take on christianity .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but tommy does hedwig wrong , stealing her songs and becoming a superstar .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: cut to the present .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: tommy gnosis' stadium tour is thriving and hedwig is suing him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: despite warnings from her manager ( andrea martin ) that she could easily be labeled a stalker , hegwig and her new band , the angry inch , continue their coffee shop tour , shadowing the thief by playing whatever city he is in .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: if this sounds like a bizarre premise for a rock musical , take a few seconds and consider the plotlines of " tommy " and " rocky horror . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as hedwig , john cameron mitchell does a magnificent job taking a character that could have simply been a caricature or an icon and turning her into a compelling human being .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mitchell has world-class style and vocal chords to match .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: even though the backstory is unusually strong , mitchell never forgets that the production is first and foremost a rock musical .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: everything is propelled by one terrific song after another and , trust me , these are full-fledged rock songs , not the over-processed fluff that passes for rock in most musicals .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while mitchell remains in the center of the stage throughout the film , there is much of interest on the sidelines .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: miriam shor does fine work as yitzhak , hedwig's lover and bandmate , conveying a great deal through expressions alone .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: decked out in a bandanna and a surprisingly convincing beard , she makes a mighty attractive man .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as always , " sctv " veteran andrea martin is a welcome presence onscreen and michael pitt is beguiling as tommy , the angelic-appearing little rat .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: artist emily hubley adds to the magic with a string of dandy animated sequences that charm the eye while underlining the central themes of the musical .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " hedwig and the angry inch " surrounds a weird , funny and touching story with a knockout series of songs performed by an exceptional cast .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: true originals do not come along very often ? don't let this slip out of town without seeing it .
docs.label: positive
